documentation.text:
@dev This emits when user of any NFT verify a device.
  This event emits when the user a device finishing the assignment.

@dev This emits when ownership  any NFT verify a device.
  This event emits when the owner a device finishing the transference.

@dev This emits when user of any NFT verify a device.
  This event emits when the user a device finishing the assignment.

@dev This emits when ownership  any NFT verify a device.
  This event emits when the owner a device finishing the transference.

OwnerEngaged(uint256).details: This emits when ownership  any NFT verify a device.  This event emits when the owner a device finishing the transference.

UserAssigned(uint256,address).details: This emits when ownership of any NFT changes an user.  This event emits when the user of a token is transfered.  (`_addressUser` == 0) when a user is unassigned.

UserEngaged(uint256).details: This emits when user of any NFT verify a device.  This event emits when the user a device finishing the assignment.

createToken(address,address).details: Only the manufacturer of SD account can create a token and will be the first owner of token.  The inital state of the token is "waitingForOwner" until verification by the new Owner.

params._addressSD: An address generated by the smart device, who only de smart device can generate this account. _addressOwner is the first owner of the Smart Device

returns._0: The tokenID of the token generated binded to Smart Device.

ownerOfFromBCA(address).details: Everybody can call this function, can be execute any code on blockchain only read.

params._addressSD: the addres to obtain it's owner.

returns._0: The owner of the token generated binded to _addressSD.

setUser(uint256,address).details: Only the owner of token account can transfer a token and the state of token need to "engagedWithOwner","waitingForUser" or "engagedWithUser".  The state of token must change to "waitingForUser" and change the parameter addressUser of token defined by _tokenID with _addressUser

params._addressUser: The address of the new user.

tokenFromBCA(address).details: Everybody can call this function, can be execute any code on blockchain only read.

params._addressSD: the addres to obtain it's token ID

returns._0: The tokenID of the token generated binded to _addressSD.

userBalanceOf(address).details: Everybody can call this function, can be execute any code on blockchain only read.

params._addressUser: the address to know the number of device can use.

returns._0: the number of device can use.

userBalanceOfAnOwner(address,address).details: Everybody can call this function, can be execute any code on blockchain only read.

params._addressOwner: the address the owner of this tokens.
params._addressUser: the address to know the number of device of an owner can use.

returns._0: the number of device of an owner can use.

userOf(uint256).details: Everybody can call this function, can be execute any code on blockchain only read.

params._tokenId: of the token to obtain it's user.

returns._0: The user of the token with _tokenId.

userOfFromBCA(address).details: Everybody can call this function, can be execute any code on blockchain only read.

params._addressSD: the addres to obtain it's user.

returns._0: The user of the token generated binded to _addressSD.

createToken(address,address).notice: This function define how the Smart Device is binded whith a new token

ownerOfFromBCA(address).notice: This function let know  who is the owner of token by the address of Smart Device

setUser(uint256,address).notice: This function define the transference of use of a Smart Device

tokenFromBCA(address).notice: This function let obtain the tokenID from an address of Smart Device

userBalanceOf(address).notice: This function let know many tokens have an user.

userBalanceOfAnOwner(address,address).notice: This function let know many tokens of an owner have an user.

userOf(uint256).notice: This function let know  who is the user of the token with its tokenID

userOfFromBCA(address).notice: This function let know  who is the user of token by the address of Smart Device
